mapper.sql: id, t_s_id, t_c_id, `name`, image_url, remark, `status`, org_id, company_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, version, field1, field2, field3
mapper.select: SELECT sa.id as id, sa.t_s_id as subjectId, sa.answer, sa.right_answer as rightAnswer, sa.image_url as imageUrl FROM t_subject_answer sa WHERE sa.t_s_id = #{id}

SELECT s.id as id, s.t_s_id as subjectTypeId, s.t_c_id as categoryId, s.name as name, s.image_url as imageUrl, st.name as subjectTypeName, sc.name as categoryName, s.status as status, s.created_by as createdBy, s.created_time as createdTime, s.updated_time as updatedTime, s.org_id as orgId, s.company_id as companyId, s.version as version, s.remark as remark FROM t_subject s left outer join t_subject_type st on s.t_s_id = st.id left outer join t_category sc on s.t_c_id = sc.id
s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.id as id, s.t_s_id as subjectTypeId, s.t_c_id as categoryId, s.name as name, st.name as subjectTypeName, sc.name as categoryName, s.status as status, s.updated_time as updatedTime, s.org_id as orgId, s.company_id as companyId, s.version as version FROM t_subject s left outer join t_subject_type st on s.t_s_id = st.id left outer join t_category sc on s.t_c_id = sc.id
AND s.id = #{id}
